title: As a BOC Admin, I want the "Foreign Opener" Special Roster To Be Sent To Lineup Cards
custom_preconds:
AC:

* In the event of a Foreign Opener, the lineup will saved in the EBIS Special Rosters utility
* EBIS will send this lineup to the Lineup Cards app instead of the standard lineup 
* EBIS will send the Foreign Opener roster until the day before Opening Day, where it will switch back to the actual roster.

title: As a BOC User, I want to be able to delete a date range on MN Payroll
custom_preconds:
AC:

* Go to MN Payroll and select a player
* Select Update Date
* Within the date range table, there will be a trash can icon at the end of each row
** This will allow the user to delete individual rows of date ranges

title: As a BOC Admin, I want Club able to submit MN 60 Day and Full Season IL placements 10 Days prior to AAA OD
custom_preconds:
Related to: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1539|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1539|smart-link] 

AC:

* There will be a new AAA Opening Day System Date created. It will appear immediately below the Opening Day system date on the System Dates screen
* Clubs will be able to submit MN 60 Day and Full Season IL placements beginning 10 days prior to the AAA Opening Day date
* Clubs may not submit these placements more than 10 days prior to this date
* Only Championship Season days should count toward the 60-day minimum and 45-day restriction on rehab assignment

title: Released/Traded player MN Insurance Updates
custom_preconds:
Some background:
Players who are released will receive insurance through the end of the month with their releasing team.

If the players sign with a new team, they will only receive insurance starting on the first of the NEXT month.

Players who are traded will receive insurance with their new team starting on the first of the NEXT month and will continue to receive insurance from their prior club until that date.

Ebis users are expecting to see the following:

* When a player is released, their profile will continue to show a â€˜YESâ€™ for MN Insurance until the first day of the next month, at which time it will flip to â€˜NOâ€™

The insurance feed will be updated with the following:

* A released player will be sent over with the release transaction as normal and will drop off the feed for the rest of the month
* A traded player will be sent over in the feed for the first time with an effective date on the transaction as the first of the next month.  They will then show on their new team on the nightly feed.
** example: John is the player.Â  Team A trades John to Team B on 4/10/2024.Â  eBIS system is updated on 4/11.Â  Sends data to BCC on 4/12.Â  On the 4/12 file, eBIS sends John with a new effective date with Team B of 5/1/2024.Â  In this situation we do not need a termination from Team A.Â 
* A released player who signs with a new team within the same month as their release will be sent on the day following the signing with an effective date of the first of the next month.  They will then show with their new team for the rest of the month.
** example: John is the player.Â  Team A releases John on 4/10/2024.Â  eBIS system is updated on 4/11.Â  Sends data to BCC on 4/12.Â  On the 4/12 file, eBIS sends John with a termination date of 4/10/2024 or 4/30/2024 either will work.Â  Team B resigns John on 4/13.Â  eBIS sends file to BCC on 4/14 with new team information.Â  On the 4/14 file, a new effective date with Team B of 5/1/2024 will be indicated for John.Â 
Â 


In order to manage the plaeyrs who will drop off we will be adding another flag behind the scenes for MN_INS_PENDING_NO to indicate that the player has been released and if they resign, we need to send first of next month OR if they do NOT resign we need to turn them to a no on the first of the month.

If the pending no player resigns with a new team during the month, the new signing should set MN_INS_PENDING_NO to false.

title: As a BOC Admin, I want Non-First Year DSL Contracts Updated
custom_preconds:
AC:

* If a the Club entered on a Non-First Year Minor League Contract is a DSL Club:
** The Add F and G sections will not be available to be added
** When the contract is printed, the updated DSL contract will print
*** Boilerplate and all addenda
** No pages Addendum F or G will be printed
** The Add C for these contracts will be match 
* These contracts will be updated to use snapshot printing, and not use Business Objects



Note: Awaiting clarity on how the Add C should be structured for non-first year contracts

title: Rework the multi add c printing from the widget to improve performance
custom_preconds:
Users are unable to print Cs for 70 players (approx amount that will be on two DSL teams and need a C tendered for them) because of the screenshot timeout.

Looking a the process we are fetching each C in full and separately.  Instead we should be able to query for all the necessary data in one shot (its possible the old add C print is already doing this and has a query that can be repurposed).  That should greatly speed things up.
